hero.description: A freelance designer-developer with deep expertise in digital craft. When projects call for it, collaboration happens with a curated network of specialistsâ€”copywriters, brand strategists, and content creatorsâ€” ensuring comprehensive solutions without the agency overhead.

story.title: The Approach
paragraphs: At Haelo Studios, every project starts with clarity, collaboration, and craft. As a lead software engineer and design-focused creator, I personally guide each build â€” from early strategy to polished launch â€” ensuring every detail feels intentional and elevated.

Instead of juggling agencies, freelancers, and endless revisions, my clients get a streamlined, boutique experience. I partner with a hand-picked network of talented local professionals â€” copywriters, photographers, videographers, and other specialists â€” who step in when a project calls for their expertise. Together, we produce work that feels cohesive, thoughtful, and aligned with your brand's vision.

This collaborative model lets business owners stay focused on running their business, while we handle the entire digital execution. The result? A product that feels beautiful, modern, and built with care. Something you're proud to show off â€” and something your customers love to use. ðŸ’œâœ¨

founder.name: Bryanna Gardner
founder.title: Founder & Lead Engineer
bio: With over 8 years of experience in digital design and engineering, there has been the privilege of working with brands across industriesâ€”from startups finding their voice to established companies reimagining their digital presence.

The approach combines strategic thinking with hands-on craft. The best digital experiences come from understanding both the business goals and the user needs, then translating that into elegant, functional design backed by solid engineering.

When projects require specialized skills like copywriting, videography, or photography, trusted collaborators are brought in. This provides comprehensive solutions while maintaining the efficiency and personal attention of working with a freelancer.

header.title: Core Values
header.description: Values guide every project, every interaction, every line of code.

items.title: Craft Over Speed
items.description: Taking the time to do things right. Every pixel, every line of code matters.

items.title: Strategic Thinking
items.description: Beautiful design means nothing without purpose. Every decision is aligned with business goals.

items.title: Technical Excellence
items.description: Clean, maintainable code that scales. Built for today and tomorrow.

items.title: Partnership Approach
items.description: Client success drives everything. Not just vendorsâ€”collaborators in your vision.
